DOC.detailed_description: Acetaminophen ( paracetamol ) relate aspirin-like drug traditionally use pain control minor moderate postoperative pain . Gradually traditional non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) become popular analgesic due assume superior therapeutic effect aggressive marketing campaign orchestrate pharmaceutical industry . Ibuprofen widely use analgesic non-prescription prescription dos . A dose-response relationship low ibuprofen dose show . Evidence progress dose response relationship moderate ( i.e . 400 mg ) high dose scarce . A possible analgesic ceiling effect suggest dos 400 mg , although correlation give ibuprofen dos 400 mg patient serum level show . However , may question plasma concentration ibuprofen important determinator analgesic drug efficacy . A high dose likely influence duration analgesic effect rather peak analgesic effect . There clinical trial investigate dose-response relationship increase ibuprofen dos paracetamol dos . To knowledge publish study investigate dose-response relationship ibuprofen paracetamol trial negative ( i.e . placebo ) positive ( i.e . best standard analgesic treatment ) control group .
